name: Visual Studio Code
overview: Interact with feature flags from within VSCode
description: With this extension, you'll be able to view feature flag details when you hover over a feature flag key in your source code, autocomplete feature flag keys, and more -- all within VSCode!
details: Visual Studio Code (VSCode) is a lightweight, powerful source code editor with built-in support for JavaScript, TypeScript and Node.js and has a rich ecosystem of extensions for other languages and runtimes. Interact with feature flags from within Visual Studio Code.
author: LaunchDarkly
